mapper.select: select * from tblmember order by m_rdate desc limit #{pageAmount} offset ${(pageNum-1) * pageAmount}
mapper.insert: insert into tblmember(m_id, m_passwd, m_name, m_phone, m_address) values (#{m_id}, #{m_passwd}, #{m_name}, #{m_phone}, #{m_address})
mapper.update: update tblmember set m_name = #{m_name}, m_phone=#{m_phone}, m_address = #{m_address}, m_udate = #{m_udate} where m_id = #{m_id}
update tblmember set m_passwd = #{m_passwd} where m_id = #{m_id}
